{"games":[{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"Gamer Robot Inc","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1878052,"totalDownVotes":115064,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[🔥 🔵 UPDATE] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":112834,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥 🔵 UPDATE 17 Part 2 OUT NOW 
New awakening, new island, new boss raid, new weapon, and LOTS MORE! 

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2300
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Revive, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Shadow, Venom, Control, Soul, and Dragon.

FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3000987,"totalDownVotes":454307,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":295180,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.

Thanks for playing!

Private Server Controls: To open private server controls you must be owner of a server and click the grey button on top left of screen.

","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":879374,"totalDownVotes":60972,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[UPD 28] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":38157,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Fighters!
📢New code at 900k Likes!
Thanks for 800k likes! Use codes "800klikes"
Use code "FashionEmpire" for some free goodies!

🗺️ Explore, and be the first to discover a secret fighter!
👊 Collect and train the strongest fighters!
🌲 Discover new worlds, with new fighters in each one!
✨ The possibilities are endless!

🎁 Latest Update:
- New Island: Fashion Empire!
- 12 New Fighters 
- New Danger Star in The Hole!
- Increased level cap to 315!
- Illusionist works for all rarities!
- New luck system! (Increases more for secrets + divine)
- Fighter Inventory Improvements!
- New Max Open cooldown gamepass!
- New Teleport Menu!
- Added passive rerolls to Time Chamber!
- Bug fixes + balance changes + improvements  ","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4132283,"totalDownVotes":458768,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":77984,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.10.6
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":516233,"totalDownVotes":31092,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[📱MOBILE TRADING] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":23941,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":250,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚠️MOBILE IS CURRENTLY ONLY AVAILABLE FOR THE TRADE HUB⚠️
Long awaited naval adventure experience. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x legendary fruit rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1243324,"totalDownVotes":242367,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🎂 [CTF!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":64414,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥🔥 Updates every Friday at 3:00pm PST, 6:00pm EST 🔥🔥

Controls: 
[Shift]: Sprint 
[E]: Open Inventory 
[Q]: Drop item 
[G or Middle Mouse]: Ping 
[Ctrl]: Lock camera 
[T]: Use Emote
[F1]: Toggle picture mode 

How to play BedWars: 
📡 Join the "BedWars" queue in the Lobby to find a game 
🛌 Protect your base. Once it's gone, you can no longer respawn! 
💎 Gather resources to purchase items and team upgrades 
🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the game! 
✨ Play custom modes like SkyWars and Lucky Block! 

💖 Easy Games","genre":""},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1588075,"totalDownVotes":102730,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[UPDATE] Shindo Life","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":34288,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔑 Welcome to Shindo Life
🔷 Explore vast worlds, play many game modes, and mini-games. Battle various types of creatures known as spirits. Unlock and randomize many abilities, and awakens. Battle bosses for their unique Bloodlines and Abilities. Rank up and further your skill under mentors. Your Shindo adventure awaits!

🔑 Join for 2XP:
🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/1226491/RW","genre":""},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":5656588,"totalDownVotes":1097425,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":102203,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🎠 New Pets! Winged Horse & Ibex 🎠
🐐 Adopt a new friend today! 🐐

Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

🐾 New updates coming soon!

Meet the founders!
NewFissy - Tech Director
Bethink - Creative Director

🔔🔔🔔 Make sure to hit the FOLLOW button to get notified when new updates drop! 🔔🔔🔔

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2708493,"totalDownVotes":348083,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":46972,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":5179369,"totalDownVotes":449472,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":43512,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 
Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":361539,"totalDownVotes":67684,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ISHTAR] ABA","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":15987,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"ANIME BATTLE ARENA

Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Helpers: K1LLUAA
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking, Ettheking, StormVegitto, Speciro,lulux44","genre":""},{"creatorId":3333298,"creatorName":"Rumble Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":29428,"totalDownVotes":1933,"universeId":3558292888,"name":"[💎NEW💎] Mining Simulator 2","placeId":9551640993,"playerCount":22633,"imageToken":"T_9551640993_a719","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Mining Simulator 2! ⛏️

💎 Explore the depths of the mines to discover rare materials and ores to sell! Upgrade your backpack and tools to gather more resources.

🐾 Tons of eggs to hatch and pets to collect. Bring your pets to accompany you on your mining adventure!

A game by Rumble Studios.","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":917589,"totalDownVotes":103629,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":17856,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.9』 🏹✨
➢ New trading system; Trade Stands! Trade Items! and multiple other QoL features
➢ 7 new Stand skins!
➢ 4 new Cosmetics!
➢ and more in game!

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4546767,"creatorName":"Pressure Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":441509,"totalDownVotes":22973,"universeId":2937673012,"name":"⚡Clicker Simulator!","placeId":7560156054,"playerCount":29670,"imageToken":"T_7560156054_e0eb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👍 NEW CODE AT 450K LIKES! LIKE THE GAME
(Use last code unlock LUCKY5000)
👊 Join the community server for codes, update news, and to trade with other players! Link down below!

🔔 UPDATE 21🔔
🥚300M EVENT EGG GONE IN 7 DAYS
😇NEW HEAVEN ISLAND
🔥2 NEW CRAFTED + REBIRTH PET
🥚HEAVEN EGG WITH 9 PETS
❓SECRET + DIVINE PET
🌟NEW EXCLUSIVE PET IN SHOP
❤️ROBUX EGG IN FUTURE ISLAND

☑️ Roblox Premium members can equip 1 extra pet!
💨 Double-tap your jump button to Double Jump! (PC = Spacebar, Mobile = Jump Button)

HOW TO PLAY:
⚡ Click to get clicks!
🐾 Hatch, collect, and trade LEGENDARY pets!
🔄 Rebirth to get a Clicks multiplier and Gems!
💰 Buy rebirth pets & buttons to help you on your journey!
⏫ Unlock more Double Jumps & discover Islands high above!
🏆 Climb the leaderboards & become a Clicking God!

🔔 Updates every week! FOLLOW & FAVORITE to be notified!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":749268,"totalDownVotes":329627,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":22473,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1045709,"totalDownVotes":85226,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[UPDATE] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":22591,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities
⬆️Upgrade your Troops During battle to unlock new attacks
⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🔨More updates upcoming!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3959677,"creatorName":"BIG Games Pets","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2678658,"totalDownVotes":211324,"universeId":2316994223,"name":"[6x🍀] Pet Simulator X! 🐾","placeId":6284583030,"playerCount":28983,"imageToken":"T_6284583030_936f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💰 Earn coins!

🔔 Follow for game updates! 🔔 

🧡 Made with love by Preston","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1623849,"totalDownVotes":89080,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":15666,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🧸 Bee Swarm Simulator toys are available now at Walmart Supercenters and Smyths Toys! Collect toy bees and hive slots to construct a real hive! There are also adorable plushies, bear action figures, and more! 🎉

Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for Honey, Treats and codes! https://www.roblox.com/groups/3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3955843,"totalDownVotes":488038,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":15193,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Lock and Load with the exclusive Virtual Nomad Bundle through Prime Gaming and unlock six unique functionalities: Character Skin, Custom Emote, Weapon Skin, Elimination Effect, Melee Weapon, and Calling Card

1) Log in to your account on roblox.com
2) Go to roblox.com/redeem and enter your code.
3) Your item can be equipped from within the Avatar Editor. Enjoy!

After you redeem the offer on roblox.com/redeem, launch Arsenal on Roblox, open the Prime Gaming pop-up, and select “Redeem Item” to receive the bonus rewards. Then, go into your Locker to equip th

Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

Join the ROLVe Community group for an in-game chat tag and 25% more BattleBucks and XP!","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2199252,"totalDownVotes":165128,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":22385,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

Liked the game? Don't forget to leave a Thumbs Up(👍) and Favorite(🌟) . Thank you!

--- 300% more health!

--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!","genre":""},{"creatorId":22718068,"creatorName":"sillyburger0","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":859549,"totalDownVotes":68914,"universeId":1000233041,"name":"3008 [2.7]","placeId":2768379856,"playerCount":39176,"imageToken":"T_2768379856_127a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Version 2.7

Thumbnail by: @Plague_Dash
--
SCP-3008, the infinite IKEA. Wander through the vast horror land of furniture located within SCP-3008-1. Build a base, survive from employees. Stay alive.

"3008" is based on "SCP-3008" by Mortos, from the SCP Wiki.","genre":""},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2651782,"totalDownVotes":396128,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💜 MeepCity 💜","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":42978,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! And join our Roblox group/community!","genre":""},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2148141,"totalDownVotes":172742,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces [May Update]","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":8117,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

New content: Three new Secondaries, One new Carbine, One new Shotgun, Four new Grenades, Three new Maps, A new game mode, Along with new attachments and a whole lot of balancing tweaks.

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!","genre":""},{"creatorId":151848836,"creatorName":"haz3mn","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":230462,"totalDownVotes":19081,"universeId":3317679266,"name":"PLS DONATE 💸 [UPDATE]","placeId":8737602449,"playerCount":11510,"imageToken":"T_8737602449_c867","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💰 PLS DONATE is a game where you can claim stands and make it say anything you want! You can donate or make Robux by having clothing or gamepasses on sale. Your items for sale will automagically appear on your stand! 

⚠️ Donations are done through clothing and gamepass sales, which can take up to a week to receive. The Robux shown in-game is the price at the time of sale. The Robux you receive may be less due to Roblox taxes. You can see your pending Robux here: https://www.roblox.com/transactions 

⭐ Please consider liking and favoriting the game for more updates, also join the Quataun group for future perks! https://www.roblox.com/groups/12121240/Quataun 

Game Design: @haz3mn (roblox) 
Programming: @fewkz, @haz3mn (roblox) 
Map & Models: @Candelzoo (roblox) 
Sound Design: @HomeBrewDev (roblox) 
Visual Effects: @kirbyzaz (roblox) 
Digital Distribution: Quataun (roblox group)","genre":""},{"creatorId":13632331,"creatorName":"Gamefam x Sonic","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":923300,"totalDownVotes":41850,"universeId":3405618667,"name":"[NEW WORLD] Sonic Speed Simulator","placeId":9049840490,"playerCount":29203,"imageToken":"T_9049840490_a6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Earn Stealth Suit Sonic in the Chemical Plant!

✨THE OFFICIAL SONIC THE HEDGEHOG GAME ON ROBLOX!

LATEST UPDATE: 
New World - CHEMICAL PLANT
◉ New Persistent Event! Help Stealth Suit Sonic unveil Eggman's evil plans in Chemical Plant.
◉ New Exclusive Chao
◉ New Gamepasses

COMMUNITY REWARD👍

The fastest game in Roblox history.

🐶 COLLECT CHAO to increase your stats and collection 
👓 EARN SONIC CHARACTER SKINS to show off to your friends
🎈 BIG UPDATES WEEKLY","genre":""},{"creatorId":1730435200,"creatorName":"SnowdustDev","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":353250,"totalDownVotes":132558,"universeId":1852226622,"name":"Gacha Online ✨","placeId":5289509545,"playerCount":40585,"imageToken":"T_5289509545_1eec","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"➡️ Gacha Online's content is 100% free for everyone to enjoy 🌟 ⬅️

[ Game Version 1.6 - Attachment Update! ]
🔊 Subscribe to see UPDATE SNEAK PEEKS and livestreams!!

~~~~~~~ Welcome to Gacha Online BETA! ~~~~~~~ (*・ω・)ﾉ
Make your Gacha OCs in Roblox ⭐WITH MULTIPLAYER!⭐

Have fun Roleplaying, Exploring, and meeting new friends!
-- Design your own character using BILLIONS of outfits!
-- Make Gacha Mini Movies!
-- COMPLETELY FREE CUSTOMIZATION! :D
